democracyData
  • Reference
  • News

Reference version 0.2.1

All functions

arat_pmm

The Arat measure of democracy

bibliography

References to all the datasets included in this package.

blm blm_pmm

The Bowman, Lehoucq, and Mahoney index of democracy for Central America

bmr

Boix-Miller-Rosato dichotomous coding of democracy, 1800-2015, version 3.0

bnr bnr_extended

The Bernhard, Nordstrom & Reenock Event History Coding of Democratic Breakdowns

bollen_pmm

The Bollen measure of democracy

cite_dataset

Retrieve the citation for a specific dataset included in this package

country_year_coder

Given a set of country-years, find appropriate country codes, standardized country names, and determine state system membership

create_panel

Create a panel of countries belonging in the state system.

democracy_info

Basic information about existing democracy measures

doorenspleet

Renske Doorenspleet's Democracy Dataset

download_fh

Downloads the 2018 update of the Freedom House "Freedom in the World" data and processes it using country_year_coder.

download_fh_electoral

Downloads the 2017 update of the Freedom House Electoral Democracies list and processes it using country_year_coder.

download_polity_annual

Downloads the 2017 update of the Polity IV dataset (annual time series) and processes it using country_year_coder.

download_reign

The Rulers, Elections, and Irregular Governance Dataset (Regime data)

download_wgi_voice_and_accountability

Download the latest version (data up to 2016) of the "Democracy, Voice, and Accountability" index from the World Governance Indicators and process it via country_year_coder

eiu

The Economist Intelligence Unit's Democracy Index

fh_pmm

Freedom House "Freedom in the World" data from Pemstein, Meserve, and Melton's replication dataset

generate_democracy_scores_dataset

Generate a data frame containing all the democracy measures accessible from this package

gwf_all gwf_all_extended gwf_autocratic gwf_autocratic_extended

The Geddes Wright and Frantz Autocratic Regimes dataset

hadenius_pmm

Axel Hadenius' Index of Democracy

kailitz

The Steffen Kailitz Dataset of Authoritarian Regime Types

LIED

The Lexical Index of Democracy, v. 3

magaloni magaloni_extended

Autocracies of the World, 1950-2012 (Version 1.0).

mainwaring mainwaring_pmm

Mainwaring, Brinks, and Perez Linan's democracy measure for Latin America

munck_pmm

Munck Index of Democracy

pacl pacl_pmm

The Democracy and Dictatorship Dataset (DD/PACL/ACLP/CGV)

peps

Participation-Enhanced Polity Score

PIPE

The Political Institutions and Political Events (PIPE) dataset

pitf

PITF democracy indicator

polity_pmm

Polity 2 from PMM

polyarchy polyarchy_pmm

The Polyarchy Scale and the Contestation Scale

polyarchy_dimensions

Indicators of Contestation and Inclusiveness by Michael Coppedge, Angel Alvarez, and Claudia Maldonado

prc_gasiorowski prc_pmm

The Political Regime Change (PRC) dataset.

redownload_blm redownload_bmr redownload_bnr redownload_gwf redownload_lied redownload_pacl redownload_peps redownload_utip redownload_wahman_teorell_hadenius redownload_polyarchy_original redownload_polyarchy_dimensions redownload_magaloni redownload_uds redownload_ulfelder redownload_pipe

Download and process various democracy datasets.

svolik_regime

Milan Svolik's Regime Dataset

uds_2014 uds_2011 uds_2010

The Unified Democracy Scores

ulfelder ulfelder_extended

The Democracy/Autocracy Dataset by Jay Ulfelder

utip

The University of Texas Inequality Project Categorical Dataset of Political Regimes

vanhanen vanhanen_pmm

Vanhanen measures of democracy, 1800-2012

wahman_teorell_hadenius

Authoritarian Regimes Data Set, version 5.0, by Axel Hadenius, Jan Teorell, & Michael Wahman

  • All functions
